title: Coinbase Hires Former UK Finance Minister To Advisory Council
description: Former UK Chancellor of the Exchequer George Osborne has joined the ranks of political heavyweights advising the crypto exchange.

title: Art Blocks Acquires NFT Marketplace Sansa
description: The acquisition is a "strategic move" aimed at establishing a home for generative art, the company said in an announcement.

title: Hong Kong authorities investigate Worldcoin over privacy concerns
description:
According to the PCPD, any personal data — including information from iris scans — controlled by Worldcoin “must be collected for a lawful purpose.”

Hong Kong’s Office of the Privacy Commissioner for Personal Data (PCPD) announced an investigation into identity verification project Worldcoin’s local operations, citing “serious risks to personal data privacy.”

In a Jan. 31 notice, the PCPD said it had executed warrants and entered six premises controlled by Worldcoin in Hong Kong as part of an investigation into the project. The commission requested documents and information and warned Hong Kong residents to consider how their biometric data could be used — Worldcoin employs iris-scanning orbs for users to verify their identity.

“The PCPD is concerned that the operation of Worldcoin in Hong Kong involves serious risks to personal data privacy, and believes that the collection and processing of sensitive personal data by the relevant organisation may be in contravention of the requirements of the Personal Data (Privacy) Ordinance,” said the PCPD.

Read more

title: Coinbase hires former UK finance minister George Osborne for battle against SEC
description:
The cryptocurrency exchange has been facing mounting scrutiny in the U.S. after it was sued by the SEC last June.

Coinbase Global Inc. has appointed former U.K. Chancellor of the Exchequer George Osborne as an advisor, as the crypto exchange is facing mounting regulatory scrutiny in the United States.

Osborne has not rested on his laurels since he left his government post in 2016. He has held numerous high-level positions, and is still the chairman of the British Museum and 

The former Chancellor’s experience could prove useful for Coinbase, which was sued by the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) last year in June for offering unregistered securities. The financial regulator alleged that Coinbase never registered as a broker, national securities exchange, or clearing agency, evading the disclosure scheme for securities markets. 

Read more

title: Crypto Wallet Trezor Alerts Customers to an Ongoing Phishing Attack
description:
